quotes.quote: We dismounted from our horses at the West gate of the City, called Joppa gate; which is a very strong gate of Iron, with thirteen pieces of Brasse-ordinance planted on the wall about the gate.

Enter through a narrow gate. For wide is the gate and broad is the road that leads to destruction, and many enter through it. But small is the gate and narrow the road that leads to life, and only a few find it.
The gate of death is the gate of exit; the gate of Heaven is the gate of entrance; but these two are so close together that as the one shuts, the other opens.
I am aware of the damp souls of housemaids. Sprouting despondently at area gates.
Death ...openeth the gate to good fame and extinguisheth envy.
By His ascension Our Lord enters heaven and keeps the door open for humanity.
Perseverance is a great element of success. If you only knock long enough and loud enough at the gate, you are sure to wake up somebody.
Never open the door to the lesser evil, for other and greater ones invariably slink in after it.
He who welcomes the camel driver needs a big gate.
Never bolt your door with a boiled carrot.
If we are in a good mood when we get up in the morning, if there is a warm-hearted feeling within, automatically our inner door is opened for that day.
Any big league starter who hits .200 shouldn't be where he is. He ought to be waiting outside the gate to get in the park.
I believe the future is only the past again, entered through another gate.
The knowledge of words is the gate of scholarship.
Trust in dreams, for in them is hidden the gate to eternity.
Both in thought and in feeling, even though time be real, to realise the unimportance of time is the gate of wisdom.
Only a person who has passed through the gate of humility can ascend to the heights of the spirit.
There's always the hyena of morality at the garden gate, and the real wolf at the end of the street.
If you close your door to the world of books, the gates of the world of ignorance automatically opens and quickly pulls you inside!
Wherever you are in life, you have come there either because some doors are not opened or some doors are opened!
There's always the hyena of morality at the garden gate, and the real wolf at the end of the street.
The hardest thing to find in life is balance - especially, the more success you have, the more you look to the other side of the gate.
Sunsets are so beautiful that they almost seem as if we were looking through the gates of Heaven.
Hell and heaven are within you, both gates are within you. When you are behaving unconsciously there is the gate of hell; when you become alert and conscious, there is the gate of heaven.
The gate of heaven is very low; only the humble can enter it.
In theÂ gatesÂ ofÂ eternity, the black band and the white hand hold each other with an equal clasp.
Still round the corner there may wait, A new road or a secretÂ gate.
Battering the gates of heaven with the storms of prayer.
IfÂ theÂ golden gateÂ ofÂ prefermentÂ isÂ not usually openedÂ toÂ menÂ ofÂ real merit,Â personsÂ ofÂ no worth have enteredÂ it in aÂ most extraordinary manner.
The success gate is far at the end of the long failure corridor. Keep moving no matter how many potholes you step into. You will get there with time!
A gate to nature is a gate to heaven!
Every doorway, every intersection has a story.
Heaven's gates are not so highly arched as princes' palaces; they that enter there must go upon their knees.
The gate of heaven is very low; only the humble can enter it.
The door can never be closed for good to any player.
If the gates are open, walk in; if the gates are close, find a way and move in!
When the gate drops, it's time to try and execute the best you can.
Sometimes we stare so long at a door that is closing that we see too late the one that is open.
